ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Kunark - Evil Outpost Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: Galtin, Open you eqclient.ini file, and locate the following line: RunMode - FALSE Replace the FALSE with TRUE, save the document, and restart EQ, it will
ygData.messageBody:
Galtin,

Open you eqclient.ini file, and locate the following line:

RunMode - FALSE

Replace the FALSE with TRUE, save the document, and restart EQ, it will default to Run every time.

There are a lot of other interesting defaults in there, too. Take a look at the following link for more info.

http://eq.castersrealm.com/viewarticle.asp?Article=2076

Hope this helps.

Aranlas Starchaser
Retired Bard of Kelethin


----- Original Message -----
From: "Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4(n)" <g4mntofcr@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, October 23, 2000 12:12 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Kunark - Evil Outpost Faction


> OK tell me how to do that please. That change must have come out while I
> was taking a break from EQ.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kirk Baptista [mailto:dopey@...]
> Sent: Monday, October 23, 2000 7:59 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kunark - Evil Outpost Faction
>
>
> Another lesson learned is to set your default to Run.
>
>
> Aranlas Starchaser,
> Retired Bard of Kelethin
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4(n)" <g4mntofcr@...>
> To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> Sent: Monday, October 23, 2000 10:52 AM
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Kunark - Evil Outpost Faction
>
>
> > I'm a wood elf bard who worships Bristlebane. With DE illusion up and
> > Carrilion, I can get my faction to amiable in the evil outpost, allowing
> me
> > to bank and trade there. However, I still died there over the weekend. I
> > was turning in 4 sarnak war braids to the undead captain when I went
> > linkdead. I knew I would be in trouble when I logged back in (why do
> > illusions disappear when you go LD but standard buffs remain in effect?).
> > As soon as I logged in, I started heading for the countryside. I got
> Selos
> > up but realized I forgot to toggle Run. So next thing I know the General
> > and his dragoon goons were whipping up on me. I might have lasted a total
> > of 10 seconds from the time I logged in to the time I died. Fortunatly I
> > got far enough away that I could get to my corpse with the invis song up
> and
> > not have to worry about getting close to the dragoons. So lesson learned
> is
> > don't bank/trade in evil outpost if your connection is suspect.
> >
> > Galtin of E'ci
> >
